programme.desc: Ratter Brained. After ratter thieves raid their mine, the Misfits, Angel and rookie miner, Cody, struggle to find an opal king stone to fulfil an order for a buyer. S7, Ep3

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: Everything Changes - Part 2. The Cornelia crew fights to save their gear from sea ice. As a pandemic looms, Russian boats vanish and captains race to dock before crab prices crash. S16, Ep6

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: Time Bandit Returns. Johnathan Hillstrand comes out of retirement. Firing up his legendary vessel, the FV Time Bandit, Johnathan assembles a veteran crew to take on the Bering Sea. S17, Ep2

programme.title: Body Bizarre
programme.desc: My Child's Huge Hands. American toddler Cora was born with a condition causing her hands to swell up. In Brazil, Judite, was born with deformed legs and spine and walks on all fours. S6, Ep17

programme.title: Body Bizarre
programme.desc: Miracle Sight Surgery. A German woman blind in one eye has pioneering surgery where one of her teeth is used to hold a lens in her eye. Teenage Indian brothers are joined at the hip. S6, Ep18

programme.title: Ed Stafford: First Man Out
programme.desc: Thailand. Ed races through the harsh jungles of northern Thailand against ex-military survival legend EJ Snyder. It's almost fatal as one competitor tumbles off a cliff. S1, Ep4

programme.title: Naked and Afraid XL
programme.desc: Hike Into Hell. Three of the remaining teams trek through the dense, snake-filled jungle. The journey quickly turns to chaos and one survivalist must be medically evacuated. S4, Ep7

programme.title: Naked and Afraid XL
programme.desc: Jeff's Worst Nightmare. With the extraction day looming, two more critical survivalists struggle. Plus, Jeff changes strategy but a medical emergency stops him in his tracks. S4, Ep8

programme.title: Salvage Dawgs
programme.desc: Virginia Victorian Home. The Salvage Dawgs travel to Hot Springs to salvage a late Victorian-style home. They recover cabinets, sinks, and a round window. S7, Ep3

programme.title: Gold Divers
programme.desc: Fickle Fortune. Halfway through the season, Shawn needs massive gold at the Bluff or his empire faces ruin. After the debacle at Sledge Island, Zeke and Emily reach breaking point. S6, Ep5

programme.title: Gold Divers
programme.desc: Reaper Madness. Keen to reverse his fortunes, Zeke starts a perilous solo dive. The Kellys risk a 13-mile trip in their rinky-dink dredge and George wants to prove his mining mettle. S6, Ep6

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: Dark Waters. Johnathan risks losing his entire live catch when the Time Bandit ventures into fresh water. Josh experiments with glow sticks to attract crab at the darkest depths. S18, Ep10

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: No Good Deed Unpunished. A freighter cuts Jake's lines, forcing his crew to drag for valuable pots. Rip helps Johnathan locate the motherlode only to pay with a broken block. S18, Ep11

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: Heirloom Home On The Shore. Chase and his team work on a family camp on the New Meadows River. The owners want to add facilities and better living quarters for family reunions. S2, Ep7

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: The Hiltz Camp. Chase Morrill and his team are in New Sharon, ME, to save a rundown camp from falling into Kimball Pond. Can they complete the build in time and under budget? S2, Ep8

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: Call To Duty. Noah invents an ingenious device to rid their homesite of moles. Billy gives daughter Rain major responsibility as barn construction goes full bore at the ranch. S4, Ep4

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot
programme.desc: Paranormal Anomaly. After recording a possible Sasquatch disappearing across a river, the team revisit the site and encounter more than they bargained for. S2, Ep9

programme.title: Expedition Unknown
programme.desc: Genghis Khan's Tomb. Josh Gates journeys into the heart of Mongolia in search of the fabled lost tomb of Genghis Khan. He examines historical evidence, facts and myths. S2, Ep6

programme.title: Alaska: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: Sweet Homestead Alabama. For families moving entirely off-grid, the learning curve is steep. To save their homesteads, they call in survival experts to prepare them for the worst. S4, Ep3

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: Cloudy With A Chance Of Explosives. Slim Pickings' efforts to recycle precious dam water are derailed. The Blacklighters scrounge for any last opal in their Land of Promise Claim. S7, Ep4

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: Dig And Digger. Sam smashes opal with a jackhammer in the Bushmen's mine. Plus, Rod and Les make a wager that will force the loser to wear one of Sam's pink shirts. S7, Ep5

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: Out Of The Ashes. With half the crab boats tied up, Sig devises a plan to save the fishery from destruction. As Johnathan Hillstrand returns to help, veterans try to work together. S17, Ep1

programme.desc: No Shayne No Gain. In their bid to set up a second sapphire mine, The Rubyvale Boys face equipment failures. And the Neils risk their lives in an abandoned quartz mine. S2, Ep5

programme.desc: (2023) Action thriller starring Gerard Butler as an airline pilot who must become a one-man army after crashlanding on an island overrun by bad guys. To survive, he's gonna have to wing it.

programme.title: The Predator
programme.desc: (2018) Unrestrained reboot of the franchise defined by a ruthless extraterrestrial killer whose name says it all... and it's had a DNA upgrade. All the better to kill you with, my dear.

programme.title: Unsane
programme.desc: (2018) Claire Foy stars in Steven Soderbergh's creepy thriller about a woman who is being stalked by the son of a man she cared for in his dying days. But is it all in her head?

programme.title: Miracle on 34th Street

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout...
programme.desc: ...Interview Special: Tom Cruise, Rebecca Ferguson, Henry Cavill, Simon Pegg, Vanessa Kirby and director Christopher McQuarrie talk about making the sixth instalment in the thriller series.

programme.title: Midway

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout...
programme.desc: ...Interview Special: Tom Cruise, Rebecca Ferguson, Henry Cavill, Simon Pegg, Vanessa Kirby and director Christopher McQuarrie talk about making the sixth instalment in the thriller series.

programme.title: Hunter Killer
programme.desc: (2018) Nautical action thriller. Gerard Butler stars as an unconventional submarine skipper sent to investigate the torpedoing of a US vessel. With Gary Oldman, Linda Cardellini and Common.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout...
programme.desc: ...Interview Special: Tom Cruise, Rebecca Ferguson, Henry Cavill, Simon Pegg, Vanessa Kirby and director Christopher McQuarrie talk about making the sixth instalment in the thriller series.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
programme.desc: (2018) Tom Cruise stars in part six of the action-thriller series. His mission: to stop terrorists from getting their hands on nuclear bombs and unleashing global devastation.

programme.title: The Spy Who Dumped Me
programme.desc: (2018) Action comedy starring Mila Kunis and Kate McKinnon. Two friends become embroiled in espionage after one of them gets dumped by a man she didn't even know was a spy. Surprise!

programme.title: Locke
programme.desc: (2013) Drama starring Tom Hardy. A construction manager's life dramatically begins to fall apart as he drives home from work. With the voices of Ruth Wilson, Olivia Colman and Andrew Scott.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Swimmer
programme.desc: (1968) Burt Lancaster stars as the angst-ridden middle-aged man who decides to swim home via neighbour's pools in Frank and Eleanor Perry's superb allegorical drama.

programme.title: The Man from Colorado
programme.desc: (1948) Western. When a sadistic Union colonel (Glenn Ford) becomes a federal judge after the Civil War, his friend (William Holden) takes the deputy job to try and temper his actions.

programme.title: Gift Horse
programme.desc: (1952) War drama. Trevor Howard plays the captain of an ageing US warship, gifted to the British navy, which is chosen to lead the raid on Saint-Nazaire in 1942. With Richard Attenborough.

programme.title: The Desert Fox
programme.desc: (1951) Drama. James Mason stars in Henry Hathaway's sympathetic portrait of Field Marshal Erwin Rommel in the final years of his life during the Second World War. With Jessica Tandy.

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: (2016) Sci-fi blockbuster sequel starring Jeff Goldblum. Twenty years after Earth repelled a devastating alien invasion, the extraterrestrials return to finish the job.

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: (1985) Thriller starring Arnold Schwarzenegger. To free his kidnapped daughter, an ex US commando must agree to assassinate a South American president. But he's not as pliant as he seems...

programme.title: Dead Man's Shoes
programme.desc: (2004) Shane Meadows' thriller starring Paddy Considine, Gary Stretch and Toby Kebbell. An ex-soldier is bent on revenge against the drug dealers who cruelly tormented his younger brother.

programme.title: Joyland
programme.desc: (2022) Poignant familial drama about the pressures felt by those who don't slot neatly into the mores of Pakistan's strictly patriarchal, judgemental society. In Urdu, Punjabi/subs.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Remains of the Day
programme.desc: (1993) Anthony Hopkins stars in this subtle drama about the dedicated butler of a post-WWI home whose loyalties are tested when the housekeeper (Emma Thompson) falls in love with him.

programme.title: A Lawless Street
programme.desc: (1955) A non-stop romp of a western from director Joseph H Lewis. In the town of Medicine Bend, only Marshal Calem Ware can keep its citizens from falling into complete lawlessness.

programme.title: The Blue Lamp
programme.desc: (1950) Gritty noir thriller from Ealing Studios. A rookie PC hunts a vicious killer across blitz-battered London. With Jimmy Hanley, Dirk Bogarde and Jack Warner as PC George Dixon.

programme.title: Anastasia
programme.desc: (1956) Historical drama. The Oscar-winning Ingrid Bergman stars as an amnesiac refugee who Yul Brynner tries to pass off as the daughter of the murdered Tsar of Russia, Nicholas II.

programme.title: The Old Man and the Gun
programme.desc: (2018) Crime biopic. Robert Redford stars as charming 74-year-old robber Forrest Tucker. He's still robbing banks when he falls for farmer Jewel (Sissy Spacek). But the cops still want him.

programme.title: Tombstone
programme.desc: (1993) Western. Kurt Russell stars in the story of legendary Wild West lawman Wyatt Earp told through the medium of the moustache. With Val Kilmer as 'Doc' Holliday and Charlton Heston.

programme.title: On the Come Up
programme.desc: (2022) Jamila Gray stars as Lil' Law'- a struggling young rapper who wants to make her fortune to help her family in director Sanaa Lathan's hip-hop-battling-coming-of-fame drama.
